name: asm-dom-hello-world
description: small web app that uses asm-dom

scripts.compile: npm run clean && mkdir -p compiled && npm run compile:cpp && npm run compile:asmjs && npm run compile:wasm
scripts.compile:cpp: emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind ./asm-dom/cpp/asm-dom.cpp src/index.cpp -o compiled/app.bc && emcc -O3 -Wall -Werror --bind src/index.cpp -o compiled/app.o
scripts.compile:asmjs: mkdir -p compiled/asmjs && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --llvm-opts 3 --js-opts 1 --closure 1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['UTF8ToString']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ELIMINATE_DUPLICATE_FUNCTIONS=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 -s WASM=0 compiled/app.bc -o compiled/asmjs/app.asm.js
scripts.compile:wasm: mkdir -p compiled/wasm && emcc -O3 --bind --memory-init-file 0 --llvm-lto 3 --llvm-opts 3 --js-opts 1 --closure 1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['UTF8ToString']" -s AGGRESSIVE_VARIABLE_ELIMINATION=1 -s ABORTING_MALLOC=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=2 -s BINARYEN=1 -s "BINARYEN_TRAP_MODE='allow'" compiled/app.bc -o compiled/wasm/app.js
